system.description:
These long leather cords are designed similarly to those used to control the horses pulling a coach. Attached to the helm of a lightning rail coach, the lightning reins allow a human with the @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-powers.Item.4grJTfjDjDVLUi5t]{teleport} power of the Lesser Mark of Passage to control the bound air elemental telepathically, directing the coach as desired.

In actuality, there is little for the driver to control other than the speed of the lightning rail coach as it must follow a path of conductor stones. An entirely uncontrolled coach will either come to a halt or accelerate until the momentum drives it off course and into the ground.
